app.sections.services.audiovisual.title: Audiovisual translation
app.sections.services.audiovisual.body: Subtitling, translation of scripts for dubbing and voice over for movies, TV shows, realities, documentaries, and any kind of audiovisual content.
app.sections.services.accessibility.body: Audio description for visually impaired people, and subtitles for the deaf and hard of hearing for movies, realities, documentaries...
app.sections.services.videogames.title: Video Game Localization
app.sections.services.videogames.body: Video game translation and adaptation of all kinds of video games. Content, menus, dialogue, credits, banners...
app.sections.services.software.title: General localization
app.sections.services.software.body: Translation and adaptation of websites, mobile apps, and software using Computer Assisted Tools (CAT).
app.sections.services.revision.title: Editing & Proofreading
app.sections.services.revision.body: Revision, editing and proofreading (orthotypography and style) of general texts, articles, books, academic documents, etc.
app.sections.services.text.title: General Translation
app.sections.services.text.body: Translation of general texts, novels, articles, blogs, tourist guides, comics, theatre plays...
app.sections.portfolio.text: you will find some of the movies, TV shows and video games that I have worked on.
app.sections.aboutMe.translatorLanguages: English and French into Spansih Translator
app.sections.aboutMe.text.part1: My name is Florencia, and I am officially an English and French into Spanish translator
app.sections.aboutMe.text.part3:
, though my vocation started much earlier. 

Since I was a little girl I have been passionate about reading, and back in 2003 I discovered that my favorite book saga was being released in English earlier than in Spanish, so I thought: "How nice would it be to help people experience these stories in their own language?". It was then when I fell in love with translation.

While I was studying, I had the opportunity to translate all kinds of texts and content. The challenges of translating movies and TV shows, the creativity, the play on words, the puns and jokes, and the differences between cultures made me realize that I really liked
app.sections.aboutMe.text.part4b: Furthermore, I wanted to help people with different capabilities fully enjoy audiovisual products, so I started my formation in
app.sections.aboutMe.text.part4d: , and now I work with it in a professional capacity. I am also part of the Accessibility Committee and the Awards Committee of
app.sections.aboutMe.text.part4e: (Association of Translation and Audiovisual Adaptation in Spain).
app.sections.aboutMe.text.part5: When I finished University, I studied a Master's Degree (METAV), and I discovered a new passion for localization, specifically for
app.sections.aboutMe.text.part7:
.

In addition to all that, my innate perfectionism, my attention to details, and focus on orthography and grammar made me wonder if I might be a good editor and proofreader as well. And, in fact, my first job was as an audiobook
app.sections.aboutMe.text.part9:
and reviewer.

I see myself as a passionate and versatile person, and as a freelance translator, I can combine all of my passions. I trully enjoy working on what I love, always having a different project to tinker with, and knowing that all my clients are satisfied.
app.sections.aboutMe.awards.part1: Finalist in the audio description category in the
app.sections.contact.text: Do you need a translation? Would you like to make your audiovisual content accessible? Do you have a project in mind?

Florencia Cecilia Romero Gonzalo will process the information you provide with the sole purpose of managing your request for information. You can exercise the rights of access, rectification, deletion, limitation, opposition, portability, or withdraw consent by sending an email to fctraduce@gmail.com.
